data.meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.
data.sentence: The word الْحَمِيمِ comes from the root ح م م and is associated with the meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.
The word كَغَلْيِ comes from the root غ ل ي and is associated with the meanings: boiled, vehemently angry
